store.name: 7777 Store
store.description: متجر أزياء فاخرة يقدم حقائب، جاكيتات، قمصان وبناطيل عالية الجودة | A luxury fashion store offering premium bags, jackets, shirts, and pants.

setup_instructions.step_1: Log in to your Shopify admin panel at https://admin.shopify.com
setup_instructions.step_2: Go to Settings > General and fill in store details from this file
setup_instructions.step_3: Configure Payment providers under Settings > Payments
setup_instructions.step_4: Set up Shipping zones under Settings > Shipping and delivery
setup_instructions.step_5: Configure Email notifications under Settings > Notifications
setup_instructions.step_6: Enable Customer accounts under Settings > Customer accounts
setup_instructions.step_7: Add Products via Products > Add product in the admin panel

stripe_integration.description: Connect your existing Stripe account to Shopify via Settings > Payments > Third-party providers > Stripe

shopify_payments_setup.description: Enable Shopify Payments under Settings > Payments for the simplest integration

origin_address.note: Update with your actual warehouse/origin address in Shopify admin under Settings > Shipping and delivery > Shipping from

shipping.setup_in_shopify: Go to Settings > Shipping and delivery > Manage rates, then add each zone and its rates listed above

order_confirmation.description: Sent automatically when a customer places an order. Enable under Settings > Notifications > Order confirmation.

order_shipped.subject_en: Your order #{{order.order_number}} has been shipped | 7777 Store
order_shipped.description: Sent when you fulfill an order and add a tracking number. Enable under Settings > Notifications > Shipping confirmation.

order_cancelled.subject_en: Your order #{{order.order_number}} has been cancelled | 7777 Store
order_cancelled.description: Sent when an order is cancelled. Enable under Settings > Notifications > Order cancelled.

payment_receipt.description: Payment confirmation email. Enable under Settings > Notifications > Order invoice.

abandoned_cart.description: Sent to customers who add items to cart but don't complete checkout. Enable under Marketing > Automations > Abandoned checkout.

account_welcome.description: Sent when a new customer account is created. Enable under Settings > Notifications > Customer account welcome.

password_reset.description: Sent when a customer requests a password reset. Enable under Settings > Notifications > Customer account password reset.

email_notifications.setup_in_shopify: Go to Settings > Notifications to enable and customize each email template listed above

customer_accounts.description: Customers can optionally create accounts for order tracking, wishlists, and saved addresses
customer_accounts.setup_in_shopify: Go to Settings > Customer accounts and set to 'Optional' to match current store behavior. Customers can check out as guests or log in.
fields_to_collect: Shipping address (street, city, region, postal code)

steps: 1. Log in to Shopify admin at https://admin.shopify.com
2. Click 'Products' in the left sidebar
3. Click 'Add product' button
4. Enter the product title (Arabic and English)
5. Add product description
6. Upload product images
7. Set the price in SAR
8. Add variants (Size: XS, S, M, L, XL, XXL or custom sizes)
9. Set inventory quantity
10. Configure shipping weight
11. Add product to the appropriate collection (Bags, Jackets, Shirts, Pants)
12. Add SEO title and description
13. Click 'Save' to publish the product
1. Go to Orders in the Shopify admin
2. View all orders and their payment/fulfillment status
3. Click an order to view details
4. Mark as fulfilled and add tracking number when shipped
5. Issue refunds from the order page if needed
1. Go to Discounts in the Shopify admin
2. Click 'Create discount'
3. Choose discount type: percentage, fixed amount, or free shipping
4. Set discount code, value, and usage limits
5. Save and share the code with customers
